Enshrouded Config Editor

Easily create and validate your enshrouded_server.json file.

Bring your own

  • Paste your enshrouded_server.json file into the editor.
  • Errors and warnings are highlighted with colorful underlines.
  • Press F8 to jump between issues.

Start fresh

  1. The editor starts with the default config file.
  2. Hover over any setting to see a detailed description.
  3. Press F1 for more editor options.

Security & privacy

  • Everything runs in your browser.
  • Config files are never saved or sent anywhere.
  • No ads. No tracking. No nonsense.

Open source

This tool is open source software. You can find it on GitHub.
